examples: Mercurialis perennis var. salisburyana S.K. Mukerji in J. Bot., 65: 56 (1927).
source: Barnhart. J. Indian Bot. Soc., 13: 245-249 (1934). Proc. Linn. Soc., 1934-1935:  185-186 (1935). Mukerjee, Sushie Murmar seems to be a typographical error in  Meikle. See also Bibliogr. Indology, 2(2): 123 (1965).
